Migration to Java 25 and Spring Boot 4: honestly, it was chaos

“I’m ready… to break everything and figure it out later!” – SpongeBob SquarePants

Everyone always says that upgrading Spring is easy, right? Just run OpenRewrite, fix a few small things, and you’re done. Well… let me tell you about our migration from Java 17/21 to Java 25 and from Spring Boot 3 to 4.0.1. For a single service it now takes at most an hour to fix everything. Not too bad. But I’ve already done this migration a few times for clients. And I keep running into the same problems, over and over...
